alert.note: Alert for McLean; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 4:26AM CDT until June 29 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Woodford County in central Illinois... Northern McLean County in central Illinois... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 426 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carlock, or 7 miles southeast of Eureka, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Carlock around 435 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hudson, Normal, Towanda, Lexington, Cooksville and Colfax. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39 between mile markers 0 and 16. Interstate 55 between mile markers 164 and 186. Interstate 74 between mile markers 113 and 127. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
